title: CAMERA PROBLEM
body:
Hi Everyone,
I wanted some help regarding my camera issue.
the thing is when I unlock my camera it just moves left or right with the mouse cursor , it wont follow the mouse up or down.
I've seen a previous discussion which said u need to switch from windowed mode to full screen. now the problem is if I switch to full screen , it says VIDEO NOT SUPPORTED and I just can t play league resulting in leavebusters. the only way I'm able to play is through windowed mode and now I just cant move accordingly with the champ unless and until I lock camera which is very frustrating.
please help me !!

replies.body:
There might be something going on in your config files that are messing with the way the screen scrolls. Let's try resetting those first.

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
- Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
- Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings

Hit me back up if that doesn't seem to help.
